message_history.content:
A conversation between User and Assistant. The user asks a question, and the Assistant answers it. The Assistant analyzes the given question and information in the mind, retains important relevant information, calls a search engine to find necessary information, accesses web pages with certain urls, and provides the user with the answer. The Assistant conducts search by <search> query </search>, access certain url by <access> url </access>, and the top search results and url page will be returned between <information> and </information>.  The reasoning processes are enclosed within <think> </think>. Finally, the Assistant provides answer inside <answer> and </answer>, i.e. <answer> answer here </answer>. If there are multiple queries, ensure all answers are enclosed within <answer> </answer>, seperated with comma. 

Note: the question is a valid question and you should try to find a correct answer. 

User: I would like to obtain information on the per capita health expenditure and life expectancy among residents of the five Nordic countries during the period 2020–2023 (including 2020 and 2023).

 Please present the compiled data in one Markdown table. The column headers, in order, should be: Country, Year, Per Capita Health Expenditure (EUR), Life Expectancy (Years), Domestic government health expenditure (% of GDP), Out-of-pocket expenditure (% of current health expenditure). If any data point cannot be found, please indicate it as NA.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the column without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.

Assistant: 
<think>

To find the information on per capita health expenditure and life expectancy among residents of the five Nordic countries during the period 2020–2023, I'll search through reliable sources. </think>
<search> per capita health expenditure and life expectancy norden 2020-2023</search>

Search query: per capita health expenditure and life expectancy norden 2020-2023
Result: [Doc 1](https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/life-expectancy-vs-health-expenditure):
Life expectancy vs. health spending - Our World in Data The period life expectancy at birth, in a given year. Health expenditure includes all financing schemes and covers all aspects of healthcare.

[Doc 2](https://www.healthsystemtracker.org/chart-collection/health-spending-u-s-compare-countries/):
How does health spending in the U.S. compare to other countries? Health expenditures per person in the U.S. were $13,432 in 2023, which was over $3,700 more than any other high-income nation. The average ...

[Doc 3](https://www.oecd.org/en/publications/2025/11/health-at-a-glance-2025_a894f72e/full-report/health-expenditure-per-capita_affe6b0a.html):
Health expenditure per capita: Health at a Glance 2025 | OECD In 2024, average health spending in OECD countries was estimated to stand at nearly USD 6 000 per capita (when adjusted for differences in ...

[Doc 4](https://www.visualcapitalist.com/cp/life-expectancy-vs-healthcare-spending-1970-2023/):
Charted: Life Expectancy vs. Healthcare Spending (1970-2023) The U.S. spends more than twice as much per capita on healthcare as other high-income countries, yet has a lower life expectancy than the OECD ...

[Doc 5](https://www.kff.org/global-health-policy/health-policy-101-international-comparison-of-health-systems/?entry=table-of-contents-introduction):
International Comparison of Health Systems - KFF In 2022, the U.S. spent $1,765 per capita on prescription drugs and other medical goods (including over-the-counter and clinically delivered ...
I need to find specific data for Nordic countries (Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway, Sweden) for the years 2020-2023. I'll narrow down my search to include these countries explicitly.

Search query: per capita health expenditure norden 2020 2023
Result: [Doc 1](https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SH.XPD.CHEX.PC.CD?locations=NO):
Current health expenditure per capita (current US$) - Norway | Data Current health expenditure per capita (current US$) - Norway from The World Bank: Data.

[Doc 2](https://www.macrotrends.net/global-metrics/countries/nor/norway/healthcare-spending):
Norway Healthcare Spending | Historical Chart & Data - Macrotrends Norway healthcare spending per capita for 2020 was $7,825, a 2.28% decline from 2019. Norway healthcare spending per capita for 2019 was $8,007, a 3.2% decline ...

[Doc 3](https://www.healthsystemtracker.org/chart-collection/health-spending-u-s-compare-countries/):
How does health spending in the U.S. compare to other countries? Health expenditures per person in the U.S. were $13,432 in 2023, which was over $3,700 more than any other high-income nation. The average ...

[Doc 4](https://www.oecd.org/content/dam/oecd/en/publications/reports/2023/12/norway-country-health-profile-2023_8febbd22/256fd7cf-en.pdf):
[PDF] Norway: Country Health Profile 2023 (EN) - OECD In 2020, the country's health expenditure per capita saw a modest rise of only. 0.2 % in real terms, reflecting the combined effect on expenditure of reduced ...

[Doc 5](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_countries_by_total_health_expenditure_per_capita):
List of countries by total health expenditure per capita - Wikipedia This article includes 2 lists of countries of the world and their total expenditure on health per capita. Total expenditure includes both public and private ...
I'll now search for life expectancy data for these countries during the same period.

Search query: life expectancy norden 2020 2023
Result: [Doc 1](https://data.who.int/countries/578):
Norway - WHO Data In Norway, healthy life expectancy at birth (years) has improved by ▲ 3.33 years from 67.8 [67.1 - 68.7] years in 2000 to 71.2 [70.5 - 72.1] years in 2021.

Life expectancy at birth, total (years) - Norway - World Bank Open Data Life expectancy at birth, total (years) - Norway from The World Bank: Data.

Norway Life Expectancy (1950-2025) - Macrotrends Norway life expectancy for 2023 was 83.11, a 0.73% increase from 2022. Norway life expectancy for 2022 was 82.51, a 0.79% decline from 2021. Life expectancy at ...

[Doc 4](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/data/SPDYNLE00INNOR):
Table Data - Life Expectancy at Birth, Total for Norway - FRED Life Expectancy at Birth, Total for Norway ... 2020-01-01, 83.2097560975610. 2021-01-01, 83.1634146341463. 2022-01-01, 82.5097560975610. 2023-01- ...

Norway Life expectancy - data, chart | TheGlobalEconomy.com Norway: Life expectancy, in years: The latest value from 2023 is 83.11 years, an increase from 82.51 years in 2022. In comparison, the world average is ...
I'll now compile the data into a Markdown table format.
